Note, this is not the file name." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

Uses the --nodeps flag if parameter set to yes." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Ignore dependency check</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DEP_CHECKs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Don't check dependencies before uninstalling the packages. This parameter is equivalent to the options &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PREUN_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPT# = yes, and turns off the execution of the corresponding scriptlets." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">No script execution</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_SCRIPTSs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the preun/postun scriptlets.
